module.name: HTML
module.param:
What is a Brand?
A brand is an arbitrary word that can mean any of these: Movie, Personality, Company, Product. Any conceivable Keyword or Label can be considered as a brand.

What is a Group?
A group is a collection of Brands and other filters such as Site, Language, Country defined on the defined brands.

What are Definitions?
Definitions contains few predefined groupings of brands. The Define section will eventually be a hub where you can add the brands, you will be interested in.

What is a Site?
An internet website pages which should be queried for the defined brands.

What is a Language?
Language restricts the analytics results to webpages containing the specified language.

What is a Country?
Restricts results to items originating in a particular country and whose country of origin matches the parameter value.

What is API Key?
This is a Google Provided API key that is used by BrandAlytics internally . Get yours from here.

Is the service free?
The service is charged based upon usage and beyond 100 queries per day is billed by Google. Until 100 queries is free.

What is CX?
CX is a Google Custom Search Engine parameter and more info can be obtained from here.

What is the Analytics tab?
Analytics tab contains information to access
